src:
Tumbang Lagi, Ernesto Valverde Minta Barcelona Lekas Move On
03 Nov 2019, 03:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pelatih Barcelona, Ernesto Valverde meminta timnya tidak larut dalam kekecewaan usai dikalahkan Levante. Valverde menyebut bahwa timnya harus move on dan bangkit di laga berikutnya.
Barcelona memetik hasil negatif di jornada ke 12 La Liga musim ini. Bermain di markas Levante, mereka harus tumbang dari tuan rumah dengan skor 3-1.
Ini merupakan kekalahan ketiga Barcelona di La Liga musim ini. Alhasil banyak yang mulai mencemaskan performa El Blaugrana di bawah kepemimpinan Valverde.
Namun Valverde mengakui bahwa Levante lebih layak menang di laga ini. "Ya, memang benar mereka [Levante] mencetak tiga gol di pertandingan ini," beber Valverde yang dikutip Marca.

Baca komentar lengkap sang pelatih di bawah ini.
text:
Falling Again, Ernesto Valverde Asks Barcelona to Move On
Nov 3 2019, 03:40 by Bola.net
Soccer - Barcelona coach Ernesto Valverde has asked his team not to dissolve in disappointment after being defeated by Levante. Valverde said that his team must move on and rise in the next fight.
Barcelona reap negative results in the 12th La Liga this season. Playing at Levante headquarters, they must be toppled from the host with a score of 3-1.
This is Barcelona's third defeat in La Liga this season. As a result many began to worry about the performance of El Blaugrana under Valverde's leadership.
But Valverde admitted that Levante was more worthy of winning in this fight. "Yes, it is true that they [Levante] scored three goals in this match," Valverde was quoted as saying by Marca.

Read the trainer's full comment below.
